1036270.name: Bug Aviators in Theme Park
1036270.description:
This is the game to attempt to recreate the realities having been in dreams of the creator.
You can venture in the dreamy world of the handcrafted figures.
First of all, try to proceed to the buildings and the attractions which marked as red letters.

Features:

  • The world used the original handcrafted figures
  • Emulator of the dream
  • Single-player
  • Short playtime
  • First-person point of view

Control:

  • W A S D - moveSHIFT
  • SPACEBAR - jump
  • Mouse-move a viewpoint
